body:
As we now can choose different kill sounds thanks to pav, I thought why not make a thread about who likes which sound most. Also might help people decide which one they want to buy;)

Personally I love the Enderdragon sound, its really cool :)
body_tagged:
As we now can choose different kill sounds thanks to pav, I thought why not make a thread about who likes which sound most. Also might help people decide which one they want to buy;)

Personally I love the Enderdragon sound, its really cool :)
title: So, what kill sound do you like best?

replies.body: I like the Enderdragon sound too! It's sounds epic!
replies.body_tagged: I like the Enderdragon sound too! It's sounds epic!

replies.body: I don't know how to hear them... If only I knew.
replies.body_tagged: I don't know how to hear them... If only I knew.

replies.body: I'm going old school and choosing the experience orb sound :)
replies.body_tagged: I'm going old school and choosing the experience orb sound :)

replies.body: Enderdragon is pretty cool if you're willing to spend the credits. It is really easy to hear and tell if you get ks'ed or void loggers appear
replies.body_tagged: Enderdragon is pretty cool if you're willing to spend the credits. It is really easy to hear and tell if you get ks'ed or void loggers appear

replies.body: I <3 the original one. Brings back great memories!
replies.body_tagged: I <3 the original one. Brings back great memories!

replies.body: Yeah, brings back so much memories ;)
replies.body_tagged: Yeah, brings back so much memories ;)

replies.body: I just recently got the enderdragon one and I gotta say it's... disappointing... It's just not as satisfying as the original and I consider it a waste of 3k credits. I don't think you can even keep it if you change back, I think you have to buy it again :/
replies.body_tagged: I just recently got the enderdragon one and I gotta say it's... disappointing... It's just not as satisfying as the original and I consider it a waste of 3k credits. I don't think you can even keep it if you change back, I think you have to buy it again :/
